@charset "utf-8";

// 定义card的基础构造
@mixin _card {
    margin: map-get($card, margin);
    background-color: #fff;
    @include border(
        $border-width: 1px,
        $border-color: #ccc,
        $radius: map-get($card, radius)
    );
    > .bd {
        padding: .1rem;
        > .title {
            padding-bottom: .05rem;
            font-size: .16rem;
        }
        > .intro {
            color: #666;
            font-size: .12rem;
        }
    }
    > .extra {
        position: relative;
        .img-cover {
            max-width: 100%;
            max-height: 100%;
        }
        .img-desc {
            @include align;
            @include flex-direction(column);
            @include fullscreen;
            color: #fff;
            text-shadow: -1px 1px 0 #666;
        }
    }
    // 如果 .hd或.extra 是第一个子元素时，fix圆角问题
    > .hd,
    > .extra:first-child .cover-img {
        border-top-left-radius: map-get($card, radius);
        border-top-right-radius: map-get($card, radius);
    }
    // 如果 .ft或.extra 是最后一个子元素时，fix圆角问题
    > .hd,
    > .extra:first-child .cover-img {
        border-bottom-left-radius: map-get($card, radius);
        border-bottom-right-radius: map-get($card, radius);
    }
    > .hd,
    > .ft {
        min-height: .44rem;
        padding: 0 .1rem;
        @include align(
            $type: other,
            $justify-content: space-between
        );
    }
    > .hd {
        @include border(
            $border-width: 0 0 1px,
            $border-color: #ccc
        );
    }
    > .ft {
        @include border(
            $border-width: 1px 0 0,
            $border-color: #ccc
        );
        color: #666;
        .link {
            color: map-get($base, link-color);
        }
    }
}

/**
 * @module fragment
 * @method yo-card
 * @version 2.1.2
 * @description 构造工具条的自定义使用方法
 * @demo http://doyoe.github.io/Yo/demo/fragment/yo-card.html
 * @param {String} $name 定义扩展名称 {add:2.1.2}
 * @param {Length} $width 工具条固定宽度 {add:2.1.2}
 * @param {Length} $height 工具条固定高度 {add:2.1.2}
 * @param {Length} $border-width 边框厚度 {add:2.1.2}
 * @param {Color} $border-color 边框颜色 {add:2.1.2}
 * @param {Color} $bgcolor 背景色 {add:2.1.2}
 * @param {Color} $color 文本色 {add:2.1.2}
 * @param {Color} $on-bgcolor 选中时背景色 {add:2.1.2}
 * @param {Color} $on-color 选中时文本色 {add:2.1.2}
 * @param {Length} $item-padding 子项内补白 {add:2.1.2}
 * @param {Length} $radius 圆角半径长度 {add:2.1.2}
 * @param {Length} $font-size 文本字号 {add:2.1.2}
 */

@mixin yo-card(
    $name: default,
    $width: default,
    $height: default,
    $border-width: default,
    $border-color: default,
    $bgcolor: default,
    $color: default,
    $on-bgcolor: default,
    $on-color: default,
    $item-padding: default,
    $radius: default,
    $font-size: default) {
    // 区别是否新增实例还是修改本身
    $name: if($name == default, "", "-#{$name}");
    // 如果值为default，则取config的定义
    @if $width == default {
        $width: map-get($card, width);
    }
    @if $height == default {
        $height: map-get($card, height);
    }
    @if $border-width == default {
        $border-width: map-get($card, border-width);
    }
    @if $border-color == default {
        $border-color: map-get($card, border-color);
    }
    @if $bgcolor == default {
        $bgcolor: map-get($card, bgcolor);
    }
    @if $color == default {
        $color: map-get($card, color);
    }
    @if $on-bgcolor == default {
        $on-bgcolor: map-get($card, on-bgcolor);
    }
    @if $on-color == default {
        $on-color: map-get($card, on-color);
    }
    @if $item-padding == default {
        $item-padding: map-get($card, item-padding);
    }
    @if $radius == default {
        $radius: map-get($card, radius);
    }
    @if $font-size == default {
        $font-size: map-get($card, font-size);
    }
    .yo-card#{$name} {
        @if $font-size != map-get($card, font-size) {
            font-size: $font-size;
        }
        @if $height != map-get($card, height) {
            line-height: $height;
        }
        > .item {
            @if $item-padding != map-get($card, item-padding) {
                padding: $item-padding;
            }
            @if $bgcolor != map-get($card, bgcolor) {
                background-color: $bgcolor;
            }
            @if $color != map-get($card, color) {
                color: $color;
            }
            // 如果$radius不等于config设定，则重绘容器圆角
            @if $radius != map-get($card, radius) {
                border-radius: $radius;
            }
            &::after {
                // 如果$border-width不等于config设定，则重绘边框厚度
                @if $border-width != map-get($card, border-width) {
                    border-width: $border-width;
                }
                // 如果$border-color不等于config设定，则重绘边框颜色
                @if $border-color != map-get($card, border-color) {
                    border-color: $border-color;
                }
                // 如果$radius不等于config设定，则重绘边框圆角
                @if $radius != map-get($card, radius) {
                    @include responsive(retina1x) {
                        border-radius: $radius;
                    }
                    @include responsive(retina2x) {
                        border-radius: $radius * 2;
                    }
                    @include responsive(retina3x) {
                        border-radius: $radius * 3;
                    }
                }
            }
            &.item-on {
                @if $on-bgcolor != map-get($card, on-bgcolor) {
                    background-color: $on-bgcolor;
                }
                @if $on-color != map-get($card, on-color) {
                    color: $on-color;
                }
            }
        }
        // 增量扩展
        @content;
    }
}

// 调用本文件时载入card基础构造
.yo-card {
    @include _card;
}
